nodes.text: Salissians were a sentient species. During the Clone Wars, the Salissian special forces were a group that Magistrate Passel Argente of the Corporate Alliance hired to fight for the Corporate Alliance Policy Administration Directorate as part of the Confederacy of Independent Systems.

Salissians were first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars roleplaying products. They were original created for the Star Wars Legends continuity, where they first appeared in the 2004 novel MedStar I: Battle Surgeons, which was written by Michael Reaves and Steve Perry.
